data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Paco transferred from a tiny college to a large university. He ____ just ____ much ____ the ____ campus ____ be. He ____ lost ____ to ____ class ____ his ____ week. He should have brought a map with him to help him get around more efficiently.
data.partBlankContent: Paco transferred from a tiny college to a large university. He underes_______ just h__ much big___ the n__ campus wo___ be. He g__ lost go___ to ev___ class o_ his fi___ week. He should have brought a map with him to help him get around more efficiently.
data.answer: 帕科从一所小学院转入一所大大学。他低估了新校园会有多大。第一周的每节课他都迷路了。他应该带张地图，这样他就能更有效率地四处走动了。
